thread.title: Olympic hack shows new threat in cyber crime

title: Olympic hack shows new threat in cyber crime
text:
Olympic hack shows new threat in cyber crime 10:06am GMT - 01:27 
Kaspersky researchers reported on Thursday that the ''Olympic Destroyer'' computer virus used to attack the Pyeongchang Winter Games was embedded with fake digital fingerprints to make investigators believe the attack was done by hackers linked to North Korea.   
Kaspersky researchers reported on Thursday that the "Olympic Destroyer" computer virus used to attack the Pyeongchang Winter Games was embedded with fake digital fingerprints to make investigators believe the attack was done by hackers linked to North Korea.  //reut.rs/2IboSjP
